    • Method Detail

      • onLogIn

        public void onLogIn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.sql.SQLException
        This method checks if the username and password are valid. If they are it takes them to the main screen. If they aren't it displays an error message. This method uses a lambda expression to create the string that is written into the login activity text file.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - The login button is pushed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • onExit

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
        Initializes the language of text on the screen according to the user language settings.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url -
        rb - This the resource bundle with translations for the text on the screen.
